name: Vonder (Thailand) Co. Ltd.
description: Developer of an online learning platform designed to provide microlearning via chatbots. The company's platform offers a cloud-based learning management system to deliver effective and engaging online training, enabling organizations to support corporate learning and talent development and schools to provide efficient learning to students.
